actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain lands in Mammoth Lakes, California, to the Mammoth Unified School District, Mono County, and Mono County Water District.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey to the Mammoth Unified School District, Mono County, and the Mono County Water District specified lands in Mono County, California.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the conveyance of certain lands in Mammoth Lakes, California, to the Mammoth Unified School District, Mono County, and Mono County Water District.
